casebody.data:
Akron Bar Association v. Jaynes.

[Cite as Akron Bar Assn. v. Jaynes (1990), 53 Ohio St. 3d 9.]

(No. 90-402 Submitted April 11, 1990 Decided August 1, 1990.) *10Brouse & McDowell Co., L.P.A., Linda B. Kersker, Stanley A. Samad, Emershaw, Mushkat, Ostreicher & Schneier, George J. Emershaw and Howard J. Walton, for relator. Per Curiam.

Having thoroughly reviewed the record, we concur in the board’s findings of misconduct and its recommendation. Therefore, we order that respondent be suspended from the practice of law in Ohio for an indefinite period. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
